data: Rue Nueve-Sainte-Genevieve | Latin Quarter | Faubourg Saint-Marcel

Mme. Vauquer (_nee_ de Conflans) is an elderly person, who for the past forty years has kept a lodging-house in the Rue Nueve-Sainte-Genevieve, in the district that lies between the Latin Quarter and the Faubourg Saint-Marcel.
